control.label: $LOCALIZE[31047]: $LOCALIZE[31046]
control.visible: Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies) + [Control.IsVisible(52) | Control.IsVisible(552)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(multiplexbigthumb) | Skin.HasSetting(multiplexfanart) | Skin.HasSetting(multiplextrailer) | Skin.HasSetting(multiplexbigtrailer) | Skin.HasSetting(multiplexposter)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[31047]: $LOCALIZE[31046]
control.visible: Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies) + Control.IsVisible(57) + ![Skin.HasSetting(showcasebigthumb) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasefanart) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasetrailer) | Skin.HasSetting(showcasebigtrailer) | Skin.HasSetting(showcaseposter)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[31047]: $LOCALIZE[31046]
control.visible: Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies) + Control.IsVisible(553) + ![Skin.HasSetting(oldmultiplexbigthumb) | Skin.HasSetting(oldmultiplexfanart) | Skin.HasSetting(oldmultiplextrailer) | Skin.HasSetting(oldmultiplexbigtrailer) | Skin.HasSetting(oldmultiplexposter)]
